articles.title: England 3-0 Senegal: Bellingham sparkles, eight World Cup scorers, Henderson sets the tone - The Athletic
articles.description: England eased into the World Cup quarter-finals with a 3-0 win against Senegal and, not for the first time in Qatar, Bellingham was the star
articles.content:
England eased into the World Cup quarter-finals with a 3-0 win against Senegal and, not for the first time in Qatar, Jude Bellingham was the star.

articles.author: Samuel Draper
articles.title: Olivier Giroud becomes France's highest goalscorer EVER, overtaking Thierry Henry with Poland goal - Daily Mail
articles.description: Olivier Giroud made history on Sunday by taking the title of France's all-time top goalscorer by finding the net against Poland in the last-16 at the World Cup.
articles.content:
Olivier Giroud made history on Sunday by taking the title of France's all-time top goalscorer by finding the net against Poland at the World Cup.
